name: snowpack-sott
description: Create optimized Svelte, TypeScript, TailwindCSS Snowpack template.
readme:
# Snowpack SOTT (Svelte, Optimized, Typescript, TailwindCSS)

An optimized Snowpack template with Svelte, Typescript, TailwindCSS

## Demo

[View it here](https://pushy-ring.surge.sh) at only 37kb, built.

## Create a new project

```bash
npx create-snowpack-app dir-name --template snowpack-sott
```

## Available Scripts

#### `yarn run start`

Runs the app in the development mode.
Open http://localhost:8080 to view it in the browser.

Hot reload enabled.
You will also see any lint errors in the console.

#### `yarn run build`

Builds a static copy of your site to the `build/` folder.
Your app is ready to be deployed!
